headline: Charles Schwab Stock Is Back. How It Tamed the Turmoil.
summary: Charles Schwab’s  stock has recovered much of its loss from its “cash sweep” issue.  In July 2024, Schwab was the target of a class-action lawsuit that claimed the firm’s cash-sweep program offered ultralow yields that kept the company’s costs down but underpaid investors.  Its stock dropped 17% in about a week in July 2024, marking the start of a period of intense turmoil.

headline: The Best High-Yield Dividend ETF to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: With a roughly 4% yield, this ETF is offering an above-market income stream.  The ETF's approach to stock selection puts an emphasis on company quality and dividends.  The ETF's value has increased over time, and so has the dividend it pays.
